attributes.additional_details:
After recent revelations that bas and gchq are collecting millions of text messages a day and that the gchq are going thru UK ones. Something needs to be done, where is the privacy. At thus point the terrorists have won all freedoms and privacy are being taken away on the premise of catching terrorists. Too many innocents are being hurt to catch so few.
This ALL needs to be stopped.
(http://www.theguardian.com/world/2014/jan/16/nsa-collects-millions-text-messages-daily-untargeted-global-sweep)
